title: Design of a TIGA Model-Based English Digital Learning Platform for Thai Secondary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning model applying a Thai middle school English education framework to adult learners, combining digital devices with offline classes.

learning_goals: Design English tasks with over 80% accuracy using the four elements of the TIGA model (Task, Input, Genre, Assessment)
Develop learner-tailored content plans by analyzing language input materials at the CEFR B1 level
Collect and analyze learning outcome data using formative assessment tools and propose improvement strategies

resources: Thailand Basic Education Core Curriculum (2008) document

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
